getProfileId

int getProfileId()
Query the profile which the BleProfileServer instance bound with

getServices

java.util.List<android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattService> getServices()
Get all the services belongs to the profile

Returns:
all the GATT services belongs to the profile

getService

android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattService getService(java.util.UUID uuid)
Get a service belongs to the profile based on a uuid

Returns:
a service belongs to the profile and its UUID is uuid

startProfileServices

int startProfileServices(android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattServerCallback callback)
To add all the services bound with the profile

Parameters:
callback - Callback used to receive incoming request
Returns:
RET_SUCCESS, the action to start profile is successfully RET_PROFILE_ALREADY_STARTED, the profile is already started RET_FAILURE, the action to start profile is failure

stopProfileServices

void stopProfileServices()
To remove all the services bound with the profile

notifyCharacteristicChanged

boolean notifyCharacteristicChanged(android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice device,
                                    android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic,
                                    boolean confirm)
Send a notification or indication that a local characteristic has been updated

Parameters:
device - The device you want to notify
characteristic - The updated characteristic
confirm - true, you need to be confirmed by the client false,you needn't to be confirmed by the client
Returns:
true, false,

sendResponse

boolean sendResponse(android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice device,
                     int requestId,
                     int status,
                     int offset,
                     byte[] value)
Send a response to a read or write request to a remote device

Parameters:
device - The remote device to send this response to
requestId - The ID of the request that was received with the callback
status - The status of the request to be sent to the remote devices
offset - Value offset for partial read/write response
values - The value of the attribute that was read/written (optional)
Returns:
true, sendResponse is successful false, it fail to sendResponse

connect

boolean connect(android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice device,
                boolean autoConnect)
Initiate a connection to a Bluetooth GATT capable device

Parameters:
device - The device you want to connect
autoConnect - Whether to directly connect to the remote device (false) or to automatically connect as soon as the remote device becomes available (true)

cancelConnection

void cancelConnection(android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice device)
Disconnects an established connection, or cancels a connection attempt currently in progress
